titleStmt.title: The life and doctrine of ovr Savior Iesvs Christ. The first part with short reflections for the help of such as desire to use mentall prayer : also 24 intertaynments of our Blessed Saviour in the most blessed sacrament : with certaine aspirations tending to the encrease of the love of God / by H.M. ...
titleStmt.author: More, Henry, 1586-1661.

notesStmt.note: The second part has special t.p. and separate paging.
Attributed to More by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Errata: p. [5] and p. [1] at end.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
